keyMoments.title: Confronts Luffy Over Fighting Hody
keyMoments.description: Jinbe engages in a duel with Luffy to stop him from fighting Hody Jones, arguing that human involvement would perpetuate racial hatred on Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Jinbe's deep understanding of Fish-Man Island's social dynamics and his commitment to long-term peace over immediate victory.
keyMoments.quote: If humans get involved, the people of Fish-Man Island will see humans as a violent race!

keyMoments.title: Explains Fish-Man Karate's True Nature
keyMoments.description: Jinbe demonstrates and explains how Fish-Man Karate manipulates water, including the water within living beings, allowing it to hurt even Luffy despite his rubber body.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Fish-Man Karate as a formidable martial art that can bypass Devil Fruit defenses through water manipulation.
keyMoments.quote: Fish-Man Karate is about manipulating the water all around you. As all humans are 70% water, being punched by a master like me would not be a pleasant experience.

abilities.description: A martial art that manipulates water, both in the environment and within living beings.

reveals.information: Fish-Man Karate can hurt Luffy by manipulating the water content in his body

keyMoments.title: Cuerpo Fleur Technique Debut
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her new post-timeskip technique Cuerpo Fleur to create a full-body clone of herself to stop Luffy and Jinbe's fight, while her real body remains safely in the forest.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Robin's enhanced Hana Hana no Mi abilities after the two-year timeskip, showing she can now create complete body duplicates.
keyMoments.quote: I've learned how to make clones of myself.

abilities.description: Creates a complete duplicate of Robin's body in another location, allowing her to act from a distance or create diversions.

reveals.information: Can now create full-body clones using the Hana Hana no Mi

keyMoments.title: Soul Separation Ability Revealed
keyMoments.description: Brook demonstrates his newfound ability to separate his soul from his skeletal body using the true power of the Yomi Yomi no Mi. His soul appears as a spectral skeletal face engulfed in spiritual green flames.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true potential of the Yomi Yomi no Mi beyond resurrection, establishing Brook's soul manipulation powers for future use. Also provides comic relief with Brook's admission of using it for perverted purposes.
keyMoments.quote: I learned this trick from praying one day and have been using its power to peek on girls.

abilities.description: Brook can separate his soul from his skeleton body, appearing as a spectral form engulfed in spiritual flames. While in this form, he cannot move his physical body.

reveals.information: Discovered the Yomi Yomi no Mi's soul separation ability during the timeskip

keyMoments.title: Clashes with Jinbe Over Hody
keyMoments.description: Luffy insists on fighting Hody Jones to save his crew and Shirahoshi, conflicting with Jinbe's desire to prevent human involvement in Fish-Man Island's problems.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's unwavering commitment to protecting his friends regardless of political or social consequences.
